category: Articles of Incorporation/Article 15 (Principles for organizing general meetings)
contents: Article 15 (Principles for organizing the general meeting) In accordance with the Olympic Charter, the general meeting must be organized so that the majority of the registered delegates are delegates representing member sports organizations that have joined the International Federation of Olympic Sports. It is based on the Olympic Games being held. However, when dealing with matters related to the Olympics, only delegates representing member sports organizations of Olympic sports can participate in the decision.
